'''Azure Crane''' is a type of bird that can be found in the wild.

==Drops==
{{Card|Fowl|2}}

Killing one for the first time will add this creature's entry in the player's in-game [[archive]].

==Locations==
They be found north of [[Windrise]] and west of [[Falcon Coast]].
